nodes.text: The Coruscant Spaceport was a massive spaceport near the Senate Building on Coruscant. During the years surrounding the Great Galactic War and subsequent Cold War, it served as the primary spaceport for Coruscant. The Coruscant Spaceport Authority managed the building and the surrounding traffic from incoming and outgoing vessels. Docking Bay 84 was also located in the Spaceport.
